Text:
Apparently Demonoid does not agree with the material found in these torrents and felt the need to ban my account. Who would of expected that from an 'underground' torrent site? with all those 9/11 documentaries and info on Demonoid and they ban me over these?  Not so much as an email... I did nothing but support them, but fuck them now... The next time I connect to their server it will be in a million session DOS attack.. *jk* I wouldnt waste my time on their POS tracker thats always breaking anyways...

My Message to Demonoid:

fuck you demonoid, fuck you in the ass. 
You can all go eat a bowl of dick.
